docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: (function() { function addWidgetsRenderer() { var mimeElement = document.querySelector('script[type="application/vnd.jupyter.widget-view+json"]'); var scriptElement = document.createElement('script'); var widgetRendererSrc = 'https://unpkg.com/@jupyter-widgets/html-manager@*/dist/embed-amd.js'; var widgetState; // Fallback for older version: try { widgetState = mimeElement && JSON.parse(mimeElement.innerHTML); if (widgetState && (widgetState.version_major < 2 || !widgetState.version_major)) { widgetRendererSrc = 'jupyter-js-widgets@*/dist/embed.js'; } } catch(e) {} scriptElement.src = widgetRendererSrc; document.body.appendChild(scriptElement); } document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', addWidgetsRenderer); }()); Complex Numbers "Two-Dimensional" number. z=a+ib z=a+ib Basic operations Addition and subtraction work by adding and subtracting the real and imaginary part separately. Multiplication works as expected. Division Division works by multiplying both the denominator and numerator with the complex conjugate , generally marked z^* z^* . The complex conjugate of a general z=a+ib z=a+ib is simply: z^*=a-ib z^*=a-ib Modulus Modulus of a complex number, |z| |z| , or mod(z) mod(z) , is simply: |z|=\sqrt{zz^*}=\sqrt{a^2+b^2} |z|=\sqrt{zz^*}=\sqrt{a^2+b^2}
docs.title: Complex numbers

docs.text: Addition and subtraction work by adding and subtracting the real and imaginary part separately. Multiplication works as expected.
docs.title: Basic operations

docs.text: Division works by multiplying both the denominator and numerator with the complex conjugate , generally marked z^* z^* . The complex conjugate of a general z=a+ib z=a+ib is simply: z^*=a-ib z^*=a-ib
docs.title: Division

docs.text: Modulus of a complex number, |z| |z| , or mod(z) mod(z) , is simply: |z|=\sqrt{zz^*}=\sqrt{a^2+b^2} |z|=\sqrt{zz^*}=\sqrt{a^2+b^2}
docs.title: Modulus
